snippet: Many travelers are using long-haul international flights to catch up on the latest movies and television programs.
abstract: Joe Sharkey On the Road column observes that many travelers are using long-haul international flights to catch up on the latest movies and television programs; notes airlines know that in-flight entertainment can be a crucial differentiator on international flights.
lead_paragraph: Many travelers are using long-haul international flights to catch up on the latest movies and television programs.

headline.print_headline: Flying Nonstop to Bangkok? Time for Airborne Theater
headline.seo: Long-Haul Flights Offer Luxury Entertainment Systems
headline.main: Flying Nonstop to Bangkok? Time for Airborne Theater
